Desc.entry: A registered charity that aims to relieve poverty and promote human rights in Yemen and in Britain and to develop educational and cultural aspects among the Yemeni and other minority ethnic communities in Sheffield and nationally. Also provides interpreting and translation in English and Arabic. Offers advocacy and support for refugees and asylum seekers nationally. Provides courses and training in art, IT, cookery, sewing, knitting, henna tattooing, cultural awareness and the Citizenship test. Has an Ofsted registered nursery and offers work placements and volunteering opportunities.
